Thx, wrked fine 4 me......
Although Xilisoft and Imtoo produce same stuff but i still prefer Xilisoft.......
And Yeah 4every1 don't block this app thuru firewall or smtng else.......cz if u do then it wont detect ur Iphone....
Just after Installing it dont update it and deselect the auto update option frm Tools>Setting...

Perfect!
Thaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaanks! Bo,Oss!
Regards from Saudia Arabia ;)

This version didn't recognize that my iPhone was connected to my computer, and after I updated to the most recent version of the program, then copy/pasted the crack into the program folder where it belonged, the program would start loading/initiating to a point, then when it got to FWPUCLNT.DLL it would stop the initialization process then just shut down.  Does it need a new crack maybe?
